QuestData.Title: Out on a Limb
QuestData.Description:
Ah, there you are.
Kua'fon ran off into de jungle. I saw him head down de western path out of the Kraal but beyond that I could not say where he may have gone.
This kind of thing happens with the young. Our winged companions have a keen sense of adventure!
It would be helpful if yours could fly, but it is not yet time. I would check any reasonably high place that he could climb to, as a start.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and rescue Kua'fon in the Slough.
